All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Athlete
This class implements an Athlete which has different statistics (offence, defence, stamina), a nickname, an injury status, and a price.
BuyAthleteScreen
class for the buy athlete screen where player can sell reserves and starting athletes extends the abstract screen class
BuyItemScreen
class for the buy item screen where player can purchase and sell items extends the abstract screen class
Club
This class implements a club which is a subclass of Team.
ClubScreen
class for the club main screen where the user can choose to go to the inventory screen or the team screen extends the abstract class screen
CommandLine
command line interface for the game environment can take input from console and perform actions
EndGameScreen
This class implements the EndGameScreen which appears once all the weeks have been complete.
GameEnvironment
This class implements a GameEnvironment.
Gui
This class controls the opening and closing of all screens.
InventoryScreen
class for the inventory screen where player can view their items and use them on their athletes extends the abstract class screen
Item
An enum with three possible types of items.
Main
This class runs the application.
MainScreen
the class for the main screen where player can choose to go the club, market, stadium or take a bye extends the abstract class screen
Market
This class implements a Market where Athlete's and Item's can be purchased and sold.
MarketScreen
the class for the market screen where the player can go to the buy item screen or the buy athlete screen extends the abstract screen class
Match
This class implements a Match in which two teams compete based on the stats of the athletes in each team
Purchasable
This interface declares the methods common between Item and Athlete.
RandomEvent
This class implements a RandomEvent.
Screen
This abstract class implements a Screen which contains generic attributes and methods that all screens inherit and implement
SetupScreen
This class implements a SetupScreen which prompts the user to enter a team name, select the season length, choose the difficulty and draft a starting team.
Stadium
This class implements a Stadium where the player can see 3 matches and select which one they want to play
StadiumScreen
This class implements a StadiumScreen where matches can be played against different teams
TakeByeScreen
This class implements a TakeByeScreen which is opened when the take bye button is pressed.
Team
This class implements a Team which has a name, an active team that contains 4 players.
TeamPropertiesScreen
the class for the team properties screen where player can view their active team and reserves, aswell as make substitutions and position swaps extends the abstract class screen
